parameters.name: data
parameters.description: NxD array, where N is the number of data points, D is the feature dimension.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Nx1 array of +/-1, where N is the number of data points

return_values.name: cost_plus
return_values.description: SVM objective function evaluated at (alpha_+, lambda_+)

return_values.name: cost_minus
return_values.description: SVM objective function evaluated at (alpha_-, lambda_-)
